snippet: Why aren't there more women leaders? Two Toronto researchers propose some explanations, writes Chrystia Freeland in her new Page Two column. But one reason is a lack of ruthlessness on the part of women who are free to lead.
abstract: Why aren't there more women leaders? Two Toronto researchers propose some explanations, writes Chrystia Freeland in her new Page Two column. But one reason is a lack of ruthlessness on the part of women who are free to lead.

headline.main: Lady Macbeth, Where Are You When We Need You?
